titleStmt.title: Specification in TEI-ODD of the Springer DTD A++ V2.4 format (IFIP subset)
titleStmt.author: Laurent Romary

elementSpec.desc: groups together all the Springer metadata associated to a book related publication (book or book chapter)
groups together all IFIP specific descriptors (TC, SC, etc.)
groups together all the Springer metadata associated to a book related publication (book or book chapter)
groups together all the Springer metadata associated to a book related publication (book or book chapter)

content.rng:value: IFIP International Federation for Information Processing

attDef.desc: characterizes the working language of the content of the element

classSpec.desc: provides attributes common to all elements in the EAD encoding scheme.
provides attributes which can be used to classify or subclassify elements in any way.

attDef.desc: characterizes the element in some sense, using any convenient classification scheme or typology.

A contextual role or relationship for the person, family, corporate body, or geographic location. In linking elements such as ptr, information that explains to application software the part that a remote resource plays in a link.

classSpec.desc: Provides the definition of all XLink attributes needed for MLIF.

attDef.desc: Labels the resource of locater element.
Supplies the data to find a remote resource.

remarks.p: Specifies a document (URI) and an XPointer

valItem.desc: Creates a locater link that points to a resource.
Creates an arc with multiple resources and various traversal paths.
Creates a resource link, which indicates a specific resource.
Creates a title link. Such elements are useful for internationalization purposes.

attDef.desc: Identifies the origin resource of an arc.
Identifies the destination resource of an arc.

classSpec.desc: Complete set of Descriptive elements for the did element
